main_title: The Best IDE for GraphQL Requests
main_subtitle: The app is the result of completing the final task of RS School React Course.
welcome_link_editor_heading: Query and Explore GraphQL API with
about_project_title_1: A query language for your API
about_project_subtitle_1: GraphQL is a query language for APIs and a runtime for fulfilling those queries with your existing data. GraphQL provides a complete and understandable description of the data in your API, gives clients the power to ask for exactly what they need and nothing more, makes it easier to evolve APIs over time, and enables powerful developer tools.
about_project_title_2: Ask for what you need,get exactly that
about_project_subtitle_2: Send a GraphQL query to your API and get exactly what you need, nothing more and nothing less. GraphQL queries always return predictable results. Apps using GraphQL are fast and stable because they control the data they get, not the server.
about_project_subtitle_3: RS School is free-of-charge and community-based education program conducted by The Rolling Scopes developer community since 2013. Everyone can study at RS School, regardless of age, professional employment, or place of residence. The mentors and trainers of school are front-end and javascript developers from different companies and countries.
